Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Jihare loka apana bura kara rahe hana jadom' unham de prana farisate kadhanage tam unham nu puchanage ki tusim kisa halata vica si. Tam uha kahinage, ki asim prithavi upara sakatihina si. Farisate kahinage ki ki alaha di zamina vadi nahim si, ki tusim pravasa karake kite cale jande. Iha uha loka hana jinham da tikana naraka hai ate iha bahuta baî€¼ura tikana hai
para uha majabura marada, auratam ate bace jihare ko'i upa'a nahim kara sakade na ko'i maraga pa rahe hana
Iha loka asavada hana ki rahimata karana vala hai

Jihara ko'i alaha de raha vica desa chabhega. Uha dharati vica bahuta tikane ate vadi vi'apakata pa'ega. Jihara bada apane ghara vicom alaha ate usa de rasula de vala hijarata kara ke nikale ate usa nu mauta a ja'e tam usa da fala alaha kola niradharata ho cuki'a hai. Alaha mu'afa karana vala rahimata vala hai
